name: Breka Bakery & Cafe
address: 2434 E Hastings St, Vancouver BC V5K 1Z1, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Cretzel Ham&Cheese Melt
hasMenuItem.description: Served on a fusion of Butter croissant & Pretzel! Lightly grilled.  Ham(pork), cheddar cheese & housemade Honey Dijon mayo

hasMenuItem.name: Sweet Bacon & Chicken Panini
hasMenuItem.description: Served on our Jalapeno Cheddar Sourdough and grilled. Roasted chicken breast, glazed bacon, jalapeno, cheddar cheese, spinach, Chipotle mayo

hasMenuItem.name: Caramel Macchiato Praline Crunch
hasMenuItem.description: Enjoy multi layers of chocolate, coffee, praline crunch and caramel!

hasMenuItem.name: New York Cheesecake (GF)
hasMenuItem.description: [NO GLUTEN ADDED] Rich and dense classic New York style cheesecake with a gluten free twist! The crust is made with pecans and rice flour!

hasMenuItem.name: Cheesecake Brownie
hasMenuItem.description: A brownie fudge bar topped with a rich layer of marbled cheesecake!

hasMenuItem.name: Mini Pumpkin Tart

hasMenuItem.name: Earl Grey Cream Puff
hasMenuItem.description: A light choux pastry filled with decadent cream, infused with fragrant Earl grey tea

hasMenuItem.name: German Chocolate Cake

hasMenuItem.name: Mango Coconut Mousse (GF)
hasMenuItem.description: [NO GLUTEN ADDED] Creamy and smooth two layers of mousse. The coconut flavored sponge is made with almond flour!

hasMenuItem.name: Matcha Cream Puff
hasMenuItem.description: A delightfully airy pastry filled with Matcha infused whipped cream & pastry cream!

hasMenuItem.name: Cake Pop
hasMenuItem.description: A truffle make of a blend of cake crumbs and frosting, dipped in melted chocolate

hasMenuItem.name: Tuxedo Truffle
hasMenuItem.description: A marbled sponge with rich dark chocolate and white chocolate cream filling, topped with dark chocolate and white chocolate ganache!

hasMenuItem.description: Served on our Sourdough & grilled. Mozzarella cheese, tomato, arugula, fresh basil, balsamic glaze & Pesto (no nuts)

hasMenuItem.name: Mediterranean Panini
hasMenuItem.description: Served on our focaccia & grilled with garlic spread. Roasted chicken breast, sundried tomato, red onions, olives, feta cheese, & Pesto mayo (no nuts)

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Pot Pie
hasMenuItem.description: Chunks of juicy white chicken breast with sweet carrots and peas. Covered in a smooth buttery cream sauce & topped with flaky pastry. A classic comfort food!

hasMenuItem.name: Reuben Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Served on our Bauernbrot Rye & grilled with garlic spread. Smoked meat, Sauerkraut, Swiss cheese, housemade Russian dressing

hasMenuItem.name: Breakfast Croissant
hasMenuItem.description: Served on our all Butter Croissant & lightly grilled.  Ham (pork), green leaf, a freshly baked egg & cheddar cheese

hasMenuItem.name: Apricot Chicken Salad Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Served on our Rosemary & Cheddar Sourdough, lightly grilled.  Roasted chicken breast, romaine lettuce, sliced almonds, apricot, celery, green onion, rosemary & housemade Dijon mayo

hasMenuItem.name: Spinach & Artichoke Pocket
hasMenuItem.description: Served on our flaky puff pastry & lightly grilled.  Spinach, artichokes, cheddar, mozzarella, parmesan, cream cheese, sour cream, green onions, mayo

hasMenuItem.name: Grilled Cheese
hasMenuItem.description: Served on slightly sweet Brioche loaf, three slices of cheddar cheese, mayo & grilled with garlic spread

hasMenuItem.name: Egg Salad Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Served on our specialty Challah bun (Egg bread) topped with poppy & sesame seeds. Lightly grilled. eggs, celery, green onion, housemade Dijon mayo

hasMenuItem.name: Chipotle Chicken & Bacon Pocket
hasMenuItem.description: Served on our flaky puff pastry & lightly grilled.  Roasted chicken breast, roasted red peppers, red onion, mozzarella, cheddar, cream cheese, bacon bits, Chipotle sauce

hasMenuItem.name: Bacon Mac & Cheese
hasMenuItem.description: Creamy and gooey comforting dish made with cheddar cheese, caramelized bacon(pork), onions. Topped with crispy breadcrumbs & perfectly baked.

hasMenuItem.name: French Toast Breakfast Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Served on sweet French toast made with our brioche loaf.  Ham (pork), omelette, cheddar cheese & maple butter

hasMenuItem.name: Apple Pie Chia Pudding
hasMenuItem.description: [VEGAN] Perfect healthy breakfast/snack! Made with coconut milk, apple chunks & walnut on top. It’s creamy and satisfying!

hasMenuItem.name: Sausage Roll
hasMenuItem.description: Flaky pastry with ground beef, onions &garlic

hasMenuItem.name: Yogurt Parfait with Blueberry Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: A healthier option! Made with Greek vanilla yogurt (2%), our house made blueberry sauce and crunchy granola

hasMenuItem.name: Italian Pocket
hasMenuItem.description: Served on our flaky puff pastry & lightly grilled.  Ham(pork), salami(pork), sundried tomato, olives, red onion, mozzarella cheese, pesto sauce (no nuts)

hasMenuItem.name: Blueberry Almond Chia Pudding
hasMenuItem.description: [VEGAN] Perfect healthy breakfast or snack! Made with coconut milk, blueberry sauce on the bottom. Crunchy Almond Oats on top!

hasMenuItem.name: Frittata Bites (set of 2)
hasMenuItem.description: Select 2. Perfect breakfast! Gluten free and high in protein.

hasMenuItem.name: Roasted Veggie Quinoa Salad
hasMenuItem.description: with Maple Dijon Dressing. Quinoa, yams, chickpeas, beets, spinach, arugula, cranberries, pecans, spices, olive oil, maple syrup, cider vinegar, Dijon mustard, spices, feta cheese (on the side)

hasMenuItem.name: Veggie Soup of the day
hasMenuItem.description: Served with slices of bread

hasMenuItem.description: A flaky croissant loaded with dark chocolate, marzipan, and sliced almonds

hasMenuItem.name: Coconut Macaroon (GF)

hasMenuItem.description: This European style “pie” has a crumbly dough and is loaded with apples, custard and a hint of cinnamon. 7" round

hasMenuItem.name: Lemon Blueberry Loaf
hasMenuItem.description: [with Lemon Buttercream Frosting]5.5" Sweet & Tangy lemon-flavored cake with blueberries inside. Generous amount of Lemon Buttercream frosting on top!

hasMenuItem.name: Apple Strudel
hasMenuItem.description: Flaky puff pastry filled with generous chunks of apple filling. 16inch long

hasMenuItem.name: Cherry Almond Crumble Torte
hasMenuItem.description: 5" Mini size European style “pie” is made with a crumbly german dough. Filled with cherries and almond paste, topped with Pecan oatmeal crumbles.

hasMenuItem.name: Blueberry Peach Crumble Torte
hasMenuItem.description: 5" Mini size European style “pie” is made with a crumbly german dough.  Filled with summary fruits and topped with streusel.

hasMenuItem.name: Pistachio Cherry Loaf
hasMenuItem.description: [with White Chocolate Rose Frosting] Nutty loaf made with ground pistachio, cardamon & sour cherries inside

hasMenuItem.name: Ricotta Cheesecake
hasMenuItem.description: Try our new recipe! European style light and creamy cheesecake made with ricotta cheese & sour cream

hasMenuItem.name: Bienenstich
hasMenuItem.description: A classic German dessert! This sweet yeast sponge topped with candied almonds is filled with fresh whipping cream & custard.

hasMenuItem.description: Rosy-red layers of chocolate sponge, smothered in cream cheese frosting, and chunks of chocolate truffle pieces inside!

hasMenuItem.description: Multigrain loaf

review.reviewBody: Breka is MagicIced White Chocolate Raspberry Mocha Cretzel Ham&Cheese Melt White Chocolate Blueberry Scone Chocolate Dipped Almond Cookie the bomb of flavours and the smooooooth texture of your baked goods 😘😘😘😘
best apple fritters ever!!! and the harvest grain bread looks fantastic. Harvest Grain Loaf Apple Fritter
Sandwich was huge! was not expecting that so I see why it's very popular. The donut was fine. Bit too much icing.
i was expecting a chocolate cake topper same as before? which is the reason why i ordered here. i'm a regular customer i want a refund
bread not very fresh or tasty.  Apple Fritter  was amazing as normal
